question: Bhanu Kumar Shastri, who passed away recently, was the former MP of which constituency in Rajasthan?
explanation: Bhanu Kumar Shastri (93), the founder member of Bharatiya Jana Sangh and former MP, has passed away in Udaipur, Rajasthan on February 24, 2018. He was the member of Lok Sabha from Udaipur in Rajasthan and was also chairman of Khadi Board.
